price: Wͻn a wͻ’di nse sε wͻ’nnkͻ wͻn yerenom ho bio no, wͻntwεn abosome nnan. Sε wͻ’san wͻn akyi, (anaasε wͻ’nu wͻn ho wͻ deε wͻ’kaeε no ho a), nokorε sε, Nyankopͻn ne Bͻnefakyε Hene, na Ɔne Mmͻborͻhunufoͻ Hene
arabic: لِّلَّذِينَ يُؤۡلُونَ مِن نِّسَآئِهِمۡ تَرَبُّصُ أَرۡبَعَةِ أَشۡهُرٖۖ فَإِن فَآءُو فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: lilladhīna yu'lūna min nisāihim tarabbuṣu arbaʿati ashhurin fa-in fāū fa-inna al-laha ghafūrun raḥīmun
